languages.text: "Не было сказано слов правдивей, чем ваши — я куда примечательнее каких-то торгашей с {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g}!" {n}Джай исполняет изящный и несколько экзотичный реверанс.{/n} "Позвольте же представиться как следует — Джай Амира Фатхрин Тамери аш Ифрит, двенадцатая дочь повелителя Ифрита, дальнего мира на краю {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".

traits.locale_text: "Не было сказано слов правдивей, чем ваши — я куда примечательнее каких-то торгашей с {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфола{/g}!" {n}Джай исполняет изящный и несколько экзотичный реверанс.{/n} "Позвольте же представиться как следует — Джай Амира Фатхрин Тамери аш Ифрит, двенадцатая дочь повелителя Ифрита, дальнего мира на краю {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g}".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “确实一点都没错，我可不仅仅只是个来自{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的小商贩！”{n}婕伊优雅地向你做了个屈膝礼，动作中带着一丝异国风情。{/n}“请允许我正式自我介绍一下，我是婕伊·阿米拉·法特林·塔梅里·艾希·艾弗里特，艾弗里特的领主的第十二个女儿。我的家族位于{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}遥远的边陲。”
languages.original_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: “确实一点都没错，我可不仅仅只是个来自{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}的小商贩！”{n}婕伊优雅地向你做了个屈膝礼，动作中带着一丝异国风情。{/n}“请允许我正式自我介绍一下，我是婕伊·阿米拉·法特林·塔梅里·艾希·艾弗里特，艾弗里特的领主的第十二个女儿。我的家族位于{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}遥远的边陲。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from Footfall!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the Imperium."

languages.text: «Y que lo diga: ¡soy mucho más emocionante que los vendedores cutres de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}!». {n}Jae hace una reverencia elegante y algo exótica.{/n} «Permita que me presente como es debido: soy Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, duodécima hija del señor de Efreet, un mundo distante en las fronteras del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
languages.original_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: «Y que lo diga: ¡soy mucho más emocionante que los vendedores cutres de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}!». {n}Jae hace una reverencia elegante y algo exótica.{/n} «Permita que me presente como es debido: soy Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, duodécima hija del señor de Efreet, un mundo distante en las fronteras del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「あんたの言葉で、これほど真実味のあるものはないね…アタシは{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の小物の行商人よりずっとエキサイティングさ！」{n}ジェイは優雅で少し風変わりなお辞儀をする。{/n}「きちんと自己紹介させてよ。あたしはジェイ・アミラ・ファスリーン・タメリ・アッシュ・イフリート、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の端にある遠い惑星、イフリートの領主の12番目の娘さ」
languages.original_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: 「あんたの言葉で、これほど真実味のあるものはないね…アタシは{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}の小物の行商人よりずっとエキサイティングさ！」{n}ジェイは優雅で少し風変わりなお辞儀をする。{/n}「きちんと自己紹介させてよ。あたしはジェイ・アミラ・ファスリーン・タメリ・アッシュ・イフリート、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}の端にある遠い惑星、イフリートの領主の12番目の娘さ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wahre Worte. Ich bin weitaus aufregender als irgendwelche kleinen Ramschhändler auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae verneigt sich auf elegante und leicht exotische Weise.{/n} "Gestattet mir, mich ordentlich vorzustellen — ich bin Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, die zwölfte Tochter des Lords von Efreet, einer abgeschiedenen Welt am Rande des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."
languages.original_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Wahre Worte. Ich bin weitaus aufregender als irgendwelche kleinen Ramschhändler auf {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae verneigt sich auf elegante und leicht exotische Weise.{/n} "Gestattet mir, mich ordentlich vorzustellen — ich bin Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, die zwölfte Tochter des Lords von Efreet, einer abgeschiedenen Welt am Rande des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g}."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire. Je suis bien plus intéressante que ces trafiquants à la petite semaine de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} ! » {n}Jae vous adresse une révérence gracieuse et quelque peu exotique.{/n} « Permettez-moi de me présenter officiellement : je suis Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Éfrit, la douzième fille du seigneur d'Éfrit, un monde lointain aux confins de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous le fais pas dire. Je suis bien plus intéressante que ces trafiquants à la petite semaine de {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} ! » {n}Jae vous adresse une révérence gracieuse et quelque peu exotique.{/n} « Permettez-moi de me présenter officiellement : je suis Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Éfrit, la douzième fille du seigneur d'Éfrit, un monde lointain aux confins de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Çok doğru bir laf ettin. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman'daki{/g} mahalle torbacılardan daha olaylıyımdır!" {n}Jae; zarafet dolu, biraz da egzotik bir reverans yapıyor.{/n} "İzninle kendimi düzgün bir şekilde tanıtayım: Ben Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash İfrit. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} ücra bölgelerindeki uzak bir dünya olan İfrit'in efendisinin on ikinci kızıyım."
languages.original_text: "No truer words have ever been said — I'm far more exciting than some small-time peddlers from {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}!" {n}Jae performs a graceful and somewhat exotic curtsy.{/n} "Allow me to introduce myself properly — I am Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet, the twelfth daughter of the lord of Efreet, a distant world at the fringes of the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}."

traits.locale_text: "Son derece doğru bir laf ettin. {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman{/g}'daki dandik torbacılardan çok daha heyecanlı biriyimdir!" {n}Jae zarafet dolu ve biraz da egzotik bir reverans yapıyor.{/n} "İzninle kendimi düzgün bir şekilde tanıtayım: Ben Jae Amira Fathreen Tameri ash Efreet. {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un ucra bölgelerindeki uzak bir dünya olan Efreet'in lordunun on ikinci kızı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
